name: Erin's Naughty Friday Prologue
description:
Never Before Has So Much Been At Stake!Erin has a very important party to attend tonight... but a misunderstanding leads to her being fresh out of the shower with nothing at all to wear!
StorylineErin has always been known as the quintessential good girl - the one who always follows the rules, gets top-notch grades, and never misses an opportunity for some good clean fun. But one fateful day, her world is turned upside down when she steps out of the shower and realizes that all her belongings have vanished into thin air. That's right, everything - including her clothes!
Your aspiration: guide Erin though an epic comedic adventure to make it to Monica Ortega's massive mid-year house party!
Your motivation: Erin's a nice, friendly person and she would really appreciate your assistance!
Your inspiration: She's naked... so... yeah!GameplayGet ready for a wild ride with Erin's Naughty Friday, a single-player adventure where YOU call the shots! Meet the effervescent Erin Bells, an upbeat and vivacious protagonist who's ready to take on anything - with your guidance, of course.
As you journey through this entirely preposterous story, the indomitable Erin will frequently ponder three different options. Each time, you as her conscience must help her make the "right" decision. Every choice you make will have consequences for Erin as you guide her through a series of wacky incidents and interactions.
Will you lead her down a path of prudishness or help her to embrace her mischievous side? The power is in your hands as you channel your inner conscience to guide Erin towards her ultimate goal of attending the biggest party of the year. But don't stress out! Easygoing Erin is a free-spirited body-positive young woman with high self-confidence and a knack for finding the fun in any situation.
So what are you waiting for? Join Erin on her crazy adventure and make sure she has the time of her life!What's in the prologue? ~20 minutes of content in
a casual and lighthearted story
with loads of bare-bottomed Erin
and it's totally free!
If you decide to give the game a try, please let me know what you think in the discussion forums. Thanks!
